name: Dodge King
description: You wanna relax, right? You wanna have some fun? Well, you can try this game. I'm glad to give you a fun relaxation. It is one of the simplest games in control. It has a control that so simple you can play on the keyboard or swipe to play. I try to keep it as simple as possible to give you a light and enjoyable game. You will control a little bear, or a little duck, or cute dog to avoid things coming to you, try to keep your little character avoid being as long as possible, that is the only way to keep you have a high and best score Hope you enjoy it
